long_description: Don't let neck pain keep you down for long. The Moji Neck+ heat wrap provides soothing heat to the neck and middle to upper back. Neck+ heat wrap contours the body like a warm hug; can be flipped around to provide more neck coverage or more back coverage. Heat wrap is made of 4-way stretch fabric and moisture-releasing silica beads; simply pop it in the micrwave for 2 min. and it's ready to use.
short_description: Don't let neck pain keep you down for long. The Moji Neck+ heat wrap provides soothing heat to the neck and middle to upper back.
